metadata.title: CVE-2017-12867 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The SimpleSAML_Auth_TimeLimitedToken class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.14 andearlier allows attackers with access to a secret token to extend itsvalidity period by manipulating the prepended time offset.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
